mapper.select: SELECT E.*, M.name AS extra__managerName FROM educationCourse AS E INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON E.managerMemberId = M.id ORDER BY E.id DESC LIMIT #{limitFrom},#{itemsInAPage}
SELECT E.*, M.name AS extra__managerName FROM educationCourse AS E INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON E.managerMemberId = M.id WHERE E.id = #{id}
SELECT E.*, M.name AS extra__managerName,E.startOfEducation AS start, E.endOfEducation AS end FROM educationCourse AS E INNER JOIN `member` AS M ON E.managerMemberId = M.id

SELECT A.*,M.name AS extra__managerName , M.cellphoneNum AS extra__managerCellphoneNum FROM `member` AS M INNER JOIN (SELECT R.* ,E.managerMemberId AS manager,E.startOfEducation AS `start`,E.endOfEducation AS `end`,E.title AS title FROM registeInfo AS R INNER JOIN educationCourse AS E ON R.courseId = E.id WHERE memberId = #{id}) AS A ON M.id = A.manager;
mapper.update: UPDATE `educationCourse` SET updateDate = NOW(), startOfEducation = DATE(#{startOfEducation}), endOfEducation = DATE(#{endOfEducation}), title = #{title}, place = #{place}, managerMemberId = #{managerMemberId}, `status` = #{status} WHERE id = #{educationCourseId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO registeInfo SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), courseId = #{educationCourseId}, memberId = #{memberId};
